articles.author: WILL WEISSERT, AMELIA THOMSON-DEVEAUX
articles.title: Americans have dimmer view of Biden than they did of Trump or Obama as term ends, AP-NORC poll finds - The Associated Press
articles.description: Americans have a dimmer view of Joe Biden’s presidency as he prepares to leave office than they did at the end of Donald Trump’s first term or Barack Obama’s second. A new poll finds around one-quarter of U.S. adults say Biden was a “good” or “great” presiden…
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (AP) As Joe Biden prepares to leave office, Americans have a dimmer view of his presidency than they did at the end of Donald Trumps first term or Barack Obamas second, a new poll finds.

articles.author: TED ANTHONY
articles.title: From Carter's funeral, an American snapshot: A singular image, 5 presidents, 379 years of history - The Associated Press
articles.description: Inside Washington National Cathedral, the five men who've occupied the Oval Office since 1993 convened for a rare moment together at Jimmy Carter’s state funeral. In that one act, Bill Clinton, George W. Bush, Barack Obama, Donald Trump and Joe Biden created …
articles.content: Look at their faces formal, etched with experience, laden with the weight of momentous decisions. Add up their years: 379 to be exact, enough time to take you back into the mid-1600s, when the notion… [+3736 chars]
